title: Repetitive "X player has opened their gift"
body:
Hey all,

Hope your new year is rolling well.. Had a quick question for anyone that can help. Around Christmas time, I sent a friend one of those gift packs you buy with blue essence, but every time I log in... I get a prompt saying: "(my friend) has opened their gift!"

Very small problem.. only a minor nuisance, but if I can do something to resolve it, it would be awesome. 

Thanks in advance,

- Trist

replies.body:
Try toggling the 'esports notifications' option to see if that makes it stop sending you those old notifications. If that doesn't help, a quick config reset *might* be able to do something? Taking a bit of a shot in the dark here, but please let me know if this works or not so I know how this can be fixed moving forward!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
Thanks for the response Broporo, I tried both solutions, but no luck :(
